summary: REQ-10 partially implemented: the header logo src was updated to the requested generated asset and kept at h-10 w-auto, but additional non-logo header/layout/theme-toggle changes were also made, violating the constraint to only modify the selected element and keep other header elements unchanged.

missing_requirements.requirement: Only modify the selected header element at the provided XPath, keeping the existing header layout and behavior unchanged; no other header elements (theme toggle, spacing, container layout) are changed.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows multiple changes outside the element (header/container classes and theme-toggle button styling), which conflicts with the requirement to keep the rest of the header unchanged.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed header and container layout/styling (e.g., added `retro-header`, altered container sizing/classes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly restricts changes to only the specified element and forbids redesigning the header layout.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified theme toggle button styling/classes (`retro-button`, `bg-primary`, `text-primary-foreground`, hover styles).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says no other header elements (including theme toggle) should be changed.
Not requested by the BuildRequest; scope is limited to updating the selected header logo .
